topics: mental health, resilience, behavior, COVID, anxiety, depression, social media
additional_comments: combined the two EMA datasets in their repository; more sensor data available online; number of max. time points and days taken as maximum of observations in aggregated data; number of participants differs from description in the paper

features.name: affect
features.coding:
Positive Affect Meter (PAM) measure of affect based on images
1-4: Low arousal, negative valence
5-8: High arousal, negative valence
9-12: Low arousal, positive valence
13-16: High arousal, positive valence
See more here: https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/1978942.1979047
features.details: Positive Affect Meter (PAM) measure of affect based on images
features.labels:
1-4: Low arousal, negative valence
5-8: High arousal, negative valence
9-12: Low arousal, positive valence
13-16: High arousal, positive valence

features.name: nervous
features.coding:
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
0 = Not at all
1 = Several days
2 = More than half the days
3 = Nearly every day

Part of Patient Health Questionnaire-4 (PHQ)
features.details: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
features.labels:
0 = Not at all
1 = Several days
2 = More than half the days
3 = Nearly every day
features.construct: nervousness, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: social_level
features.coding:
Have you spent most of your time alone or with others today?
1 = Almost always alone
2 = Mostly alone, a little time with others
3 = Equal amounts of time alone and with others
4 = Mostly with others, a little time alone
5 = Almost always with others

features.labels:

features.name: perception_worry
features.description: Worrry about what other people think
features.coding:
Right now, I worry about what other people think of me.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little bit
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very much
5 = Extremely

Part of State Self-Esteem Scale
